text: Ani he ki tumhi apalya aparadhanna apalya palanakartyakaduna mapha karavuna ghya, maga tyacyacakade ekacitta vha. To tumhala eka nirdharita veleparyanta (jivana) samugri de'ila ani pratyeka cangale kama karanaryavara adhika krpa karila ani jara tumhi loka tonda phiravita rahilata tara mala tumacyababata eka mothya divasacya sikseci cinta vatate
